name: Dagor Dagorath
description:
DAGOR DAGORATH (prototype - University Project)

Military game based in your hability to manage your resources so you can take your army to victory. 

Art and Story inspired by Tolkien's World of "The Lord Of The Rings"

You can choose between a basic dwarf or a special attack to defend yourself of Morgoth's army.

Similar games:  Age of War 1, 2 ...
